DataElement.preferredName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System, Parent Rating Form Conceptual Domain Raw Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the Adaptive Behavior Assessment System Parent Form - Conceptual Domain Raw Score.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System, Parent Rating Form Conceptual Domain Raw Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A comprehensive norm-referenced assessment of the adaptive skills of individuals ages 5 to 21 years that is used to evaluate children with intellectual and developmental disabilities. This form is completed by parents or others responsible for the child's primary care._A domain of the General Adaptive Composite Score that is made up of scores from communication, functional academics, and self-direction skills assessments._A single score that is derived from a test or an observation and that has not been transformed or altered.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System, Parent Rating Form Conceptual Domain
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A comprehensive norm-referenced assessment of the adaptive skills of individuals ages 5 to 21 years that is used to evaluate children with intellectual and developmental disabilities. This form is completed by parents or others responsible for the child's primary care.:A domain of the General Adaptive Composite Score that is made up of scores from communication, functional academics, and self-direction skills assessments.

Concepts.longName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System, Parent Rating Form
Concepts.definition: A comprehensive norm-referenced assessment of the adaptive skills of individuals ages 5 to 21 years that is used to evaluate children with intellectual and developmental disabilities. This form is completed by parents or others responsible for the child's primary care.
A domain of the General Adaptive Composite Score that is made up of scores from communication, functional academics, and self-direction skills assessments.

Property.preferredDefinition: A single score that is derived from a test or an observation and that has not been transformed or altered.

Concepts.definition: A single score that is derived from a test or an observation and that has not been transformed or altered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity that represents the conversion of an individual score into a standard form made without knowledge of the population standard deviation and mean for the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.origin: BRIEF-SR: Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function-Self-Report Version. Steven C. Guy, PhD, Peter K. Isquith, PhD, Gerard A. Gioia, PhD, Psychological Assessment Resources, 2004
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for COG study in Rave per request by W.Wong. mc 3/25/15
